summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3487, for the improvement of Florentia Street, from Westlake Avenue North to Nickerson Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43253 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
